product.name: Double Curtain Rods for Window 72 to 144 Inch, Brushed Nickel Decorative Double Drapery Rod with Urn Finials, 1-Inch Front and 5/8 Inch Back Double Window Rods, Adjustable Double Rod Curtain Dual Rods
product.description:
We are a professional manufacturer of curtain rods.
Decorative curtain rods, easy to install, very simple and beautiful.
DECORATIVE AND PRACTICAL: Available in 5 colors (Matte Black, Brushed Nickel, Light Gold, Warm Gold, Antique Bronze) and 3 dimensions (28-48", 48-84", 72-144"). Put the sheers on the back rod and the blackout curtains on the front rod. The simple and elegant look can be matched with various home decorations.
product.bullet_points:
• DOUBLE DRAPERY RODS: Heavy duty 1-Inch diameter front rod and 5/8-Inch diameter back rod easily withstand light, medium and heavy blackout curtains without worrying about bending or sagging. Simple and classic urn finials on both ends, add visual look to your windows and decorate home perfectly.
• ADJUSTABLE LENGTH 72-144": Our Telescoping double window rod can be adjusted between 72-144 inches to meet the needs of different window sizes. Double drapery rods structure creates a layered look, and is ideal for bedroom, living room, dining room, kitchens or patio.
• STURDY AND DURABLE: Dual curtain rod adopts high-temperature curing coating and delicately polished processing, classic and long lasting. Premium aluminum double bracket, more stable better weight bearing and no rust. Use them to hang a variety of drapes. Hold up to 30lb easily.
• EASY TO INSTALL: The double window rod 72-144" packed with 1 set of front rod (3pcs rods), 1 set of back rod (3pcs rods), 2 large finials, 2 small finials, 3 double brackets, 1 set of screws & anchors and instructions. You can mount these curtain rods easily on the wall.
• DECORATIVE AND PRACTICAL: Available in 3 colors (Matte Black, Brushed Nickel, Light Gold) and 3 dimensions (28-48", 48-84", 72-144"). Put the sheers on the back rod and the blackout curtains on the front rod. The simple and elegant look can be matched with various home decorations.
• DOUBLE RODS CURTAIN 72-144": Decorative curtain rod can easily extend from 72 to 144 inches, If you need to install 72-96 inches, you only need to use 2 rods each; If you need to install 97-144 inches, you need to use 3 rods each. Please refer to the details page for specific installation.
• Yun Nephele SERVICE: Our store have many different styles of curtain rods for you to choose from. Please decorate your home with the styles you like. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at any time.
